---
title: "Other extensions"
---

Here are some extension techniques that are under development:

+ [Sparse covSTATIS](https://analyticalsciencejournals.onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/full/10.1002/cem.3443) by Ju-Chi Yu, Ph.D.
  + [Code for the paper](https://github.com/juchiyu/sDiSTATISpaper)
  + [The SPAFAC Package](https://github.com/juchiyu/SPAFAC) - under testing for sparse covSTATIS

+ [K+1 covSTATIS](https://github.com/jennyrieck/C-MARINeR) by Derek Beaton, Ph.D. & Jenny Reick, Ph.D.

+ [Discriminant and hierarchical DiSTATIS](https://github.com/michaelkriegsman/DiDiSTATIS) by Michale Kreigsman, Ph.D.
